JobFullDesc: Uber is a technology company that is changing the way the world thinks about the gig economy! We are building technology people use everyday. Whether it's heading home from work, getting a meal delivered from a favorite restaurant, or a way to earn extra income, Uber is part of the fabric of daily life. We're helping to make cities safer, smarter, and more connected. And we're doing it at a global scale-energizing local economies and bringing opportunity to millions of people around the world. We are currently searching for a Senior Counsel, Safety & Risk who will continue to help us build effective safety and risk management policies and products across our global platforms. This is a great opportunity to join a mission-driven team and to work on cutting edge issues in an exciting, fast-paced environment.  Day-to-day responsibilities include: Working with Uber’s Senior Legal Director of Safety, Vice President of Core Services, and many others to advise on product development, deployment of innovative tech enhancements, and research initiatives to address safety and other platform risks Identifying legal and compliance risks in the product and tech development process and successfully driving mitigation effortsCoordinating legal advice across diverse disciplines and geographies globallyDeveloping high-impact awareness, training, and playbooks for internal client groups to scale impact of critical legal adviceDelivering effective and practical compliance counseling and advice, in support of Uber’s goals Basic Qualifications Minimum of 8 years of experience in private practice, government service, and/or in-house roleLaw degree from an accredited institution and active membership in good standing in at least one state bar Preferred QualificationsDemonstrated ability to make decisions and influence, persuade, and build consensusComfortable working in a fast-paced environment and growing into new areas of responsibility, with self-starter qualitiesExcellent oral communication and interpersonal skillsSuperior analytical and legal skills, mature judgment, and innovative thinking About the Team You’ll work on the Safety Legal team, which provides legal advice and counseling to the Safety and Risk team at HQ, as well as to operations, product, policy, and communications teams throughout all of Uber’s global regions and lines of business. This position can be based in Chicago, New York, San Francisco, or Washington, DC and reports to Uber’s Senior Legal Director for Safety.
